Name: After Hours
About the game: Find the password, crack the encryption A great scientist went missing some thirty years ago, and no one has been able to decrypt his now legendary, encrypted research. It's your turn to take a swing at it. After Hours is a remake of the popular Newgrounds game 128k - a detective game , built completely from scratch with all new puzzles for Steam. If you would find yourself in front of an old computer today, and discover something you don't really understand - what would you do? Pick up your smartphone and Google, right? After Hours blends the line between gaming and reality in an outside-the-box experience.
